events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but want to request a refund because it didn't fit and I no longer need it.
The customer's message contains keywords related to refund; assigning cluster 'Refund' to this case.
Case assigned to customer support agent Alice for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket has been opened or used so we can proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and still in its original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund once you send back the jacket using the prepaid return label I will email you shortly.
That sounds great, thanks for your help! I'll await the return label email to send the jacket back.
The return label email has been sent and once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm you have sent back the jacket and to let you know we are ready to process your refund once received.
We have received the jacket and processed your refund successfully. Thank you for shopping with us and have a great day!
